field.name: summary
field.value: AjaxHelper assumes user is using prototype

field.name: description
field.value: The AjaxHelper is hardcoded to use prototype javascript library. This helper should use whatever IJSGenerator the user configured!

comment.author: jsimons
comment.text: Nope, there is too much to change and quite possible breaking changes. One of my goals for Monorail 3.0 :)

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text:
ok :)
Can you John edit the 'releases' list? Would be good to add v2.0 Also I really miss the 'will be fixed in version' field, but this will hopefully be addressed as we move to YouTrack or something else.

comment.author: jsimons
comment.text: * '''Type''' changed from ''Bug'' to ''Improvement''. * '''Version Affected''' changed from ''Future'' to ''2.0''.
